docs.snippet: Quiet strength in the Canadian dollar was the only incident of an otherwise dull week in the foreign exchanges. At the closing price of 87.31 cents, Dominion remittance was up 7/1 cent over the previous week, and a recovery of all the ground lost in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Quiet strength in the Canadian dollar was the only incident of an otherwise dull week in the foreign exchanges. At the closing price of 87.31 cents, Dominion remittance was up 7/1 cent over the previous week, and a recovery of all the ground lost in the last month.

docs.snippet: Completing his first buying trip in the United States in twenty-one years, Hector B. Deque, Uruguayan wholesaler, was guest honor yesterday at a luncheon held by the Block International Corporation at the Advertising Club. F.J. Emmerich, vice...
docs.lead_paragraph: Completing his first buying trip in the United States in twenty-one years, Hector B. Deque, Uruguayan wholesaler, was guest honor yesterday at a luncheon held by the Block International Corporation at the Advertising Club. F.J. Emmerich, vice president of the corporation, presided at the luncheon, which was designed to foster inter-American trade.

headline.main: URUGUAYAN BUYER LAUDS U.S. APPAREL; Sportswear and Bathing Suits 'Best in World', He Says at Latin Luncheon HOPEFUL ON DELIVERIES Expects to Get Goods in 2 or 3 Months -- Harvey Finds Ship Problem Serious

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 22 (U.P.) -- To prevent abandonment of the Pan-American Games at Buenos Aires in November, the United States Sports Federation was urged today to send a small delegation of athletes despite last week's official withdrawal.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 22 -- United States air services throughout the Americas will be increased at once to speed the war effort and defense activities in accordance with plans worked out in cooperation with government departments, it was announced today...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 22 -- United States air services throughout the Americas will be increased at once to speed the war effort and defense activities in accordance with plans worked out in cooperation with government departments, it was announced today by Pan American Airways.

headline.main: ADDING AIR SERVICE IN THE HEMISPHERE; Pan American Steps Up Flights Between Miami and Canal Zone to 28 Every Week DAILY ONWARD TO SOUTH Most of Intercontinent Traffic Is Speeded in Big Planes, a Study Discloses

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 23 -- Demand for firm action by the Argentine Government on the torpedoing of the tanker Victoria was made by the newspaper El Mundo this morning. It is the first of the major dailies to take up the matter editorially. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, April 23 -- Demand for firm action by the Argentine Government on the torpedoing of the tanker Victoria was made by the newspaper El Mundo this morning. It is the first of the major dailies to take up the matter editorially. The impression caused by El Mundo's remarks is heightened by the fact that they were made in violation of the State siege regulations which forbid any public discussion of international questions.
docs.abstract: Buenos Aires Mundo comment on Argentine war stand
